A child corrupted by Arcana.

  • When you let The Goblin Explore a Waypoint in your place, roll +The Goblin’s health. On a strong hit add the option to the list:
    • You find a waypoint from your Covenant.
  • When The Goblin helps you Clash in a chaotic, intense or all around ugly fight, you may reroll one of the challenge dice.
  • The Goblin may Tap the Arcana by blurting forth horrible words to curse your enemies. Roll +the Goblin’s health. Instead of marking the Arcana Track, envision how their body is forever damaged by the Arcana.
